input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Manager (Direct Hire)

Location: Everett, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Express Employment Professionals is seeking a Maintenance Manager for a company in Everett. In this role your task will be to oversee, direct and coordinate the work of the maintenance team, ensuring safety protocols are followed, managing repair-oriented projects, and fostering collaboration between maintenance and other departments. This is a Full-Time day shift direct hire opportunity.

Salary Range: $95,000 - $140,000 per year

Shift: Full-Time/ Day shift

Responsibilities: Supervising, directing, and coordinating maintenance work.Enforcing safety guidelines and promoting safe practices.Facilitating communication between maintenance and other departments.Managing repair projects and work order processes.Developing strategic improvement plans.Provide direction in the prioritization of planned work. Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or equivalent experience, 5-7 years of relevant leadership experience, preferably in food manufacturing.Strong leadership, project management skills, and a deep understanding of industrial components.Able to develop relationships with internal and external stakeholders.Creative problem solving.Comfortable moving at a fast pace. If you’re looking for a fulltime job with a great company, don’t wait - apply today!

We offer several ways to apply: Visit us online at www.expresspros.com/applyCall us today at 425-339-8400 to schedule an interviewEmail your resume to Jobs.EverettWA@expresspros.com and include the job title in the subject lineStop by our office at 906 SE Everett Mall Way, Suite 140, Everett, WA (located inside the glass building next to Applebee’s).We are open 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Friday. Don’t forget to download the ExpressJobs app to stay up to date on our latest offerings! Benefits of working with Express include holiday pay, medical insurance, 401K, and more!

About us:

Express works with job seekers to help them find the right job for their skills and experience. As one of the leading staffing companies in North America, State, and in Everett, WA, we’re here to help you take the next step in your career. Whether you are ready for a full-time position, looking for part-time work, or want a more flexible schedule, Express has a wide range of jobs available including: AdministrativeLight IndustrialSkilled TradesProfessional positions We are an equal opportunity employer who has been matching businesses throughout Snohomish County with top talent for more than two decades. Job seekers NEVER pay a fee. And as of June 2022, the Express Employment office in Everett is under new ownership! Let us guide you down the path of your new career today!

#3221 PandoLogic. , Location: Everett, WA - 98207

Experience Level (if available): None
